thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
I have used dial a flight several times now to book flights and accommodation to Australia for myself and my family. The price Quote: d has always been very competitive and the customer service excellent. They always communicate frequently and very effectively - if they say they will call you back they do, which sounds obvious but doesn't always happen with other companies. I will continue to use dial a flight and recommend them to all.
Chris
